about_the_game:
You're invited to the biggest party of the year!
But the food has gone bad, and they're threatening to crash the party, forever!
It's up to you to stop them before it's too late!

Box Party is a cartoony retro FPS where you shoot foods and go to parties.

Also you are a Box.
Along the way you'll find cool weapons to use, fellow partygoers to talk to, and more importantly, plenty of food to fight.


Box Party consists of a short and replayable Story Mode with all 6 stages containing unique mechanics, difficult boss fights, and plenty of optional content to find like side quests, easter eggs, and NPCs. Also included is a Challenge Mode to unlock after you complete the game, filled with a bunch of mini-stages to complete.


Ammo pickups are scarce in Box Party, and health pickups are nigh non-existent. Instead, regain your health and ammo by defeating foods! Combined with low ammo capacity and aggressive foods, you'll need to get a hang of the combat loop in Box Party to do well on higher difficulties.

Here's a list of features to get you interested in Box Party:

  • Unlock new playable boxes, each with their own unique abilities!
  • Fight a balanced diet of foods and difficult bosses!
  • Assemble an arsenal of party-themed weaponry!
  • Contains over 60 hats to collect!
  • A disgusting amount of secrets for you to find! (you won't find em all)
  • Make small talk with NPCs!
  • Keep track of your high scores!
  • A handy dandy guidebook to help you out!
  • Full mod support, thanks to the GZDoom engine!
  • Play with up to 7 of your friends over LAN co-op!
  • A free demo, containing half the story and playable boxes!

Will you become the Ultimate Party Star?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual-Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any GPU capable of running OpenGL 3.3 or OpenGLES 2.0.
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Make sure your graphics drivers are up to date.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual-Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any GPU capable of running Vulkan/OpenGL 4.5.
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Make sure your graphics drivers are up to date.
